title: PUT ON HOLD DROOLS IMPORT JOBS (CRS/QI/FATCA) FOR CH ON  PROD-LIKE

task_list.instruction_title:
**DR and RUN**

Please ensure that QI/FATCA/CRS IMPORT JOBS - CH be PUT ON HOLD from Thursday until Sunday on Weekend 1, on PROD-Like.
